text:
@realDonaldTrump Riots in the streets of every major American city
 
105,000 dead from #COVID19

40 million jobs lost

18% unemployment rate, worst since the Great Depression

Devastated economy

Racial polarization across the nation

Are you finished making America great again?

#MAGA
